## Complete records {.tabset .tabset-dropdown}

```{r, context = "server"}
data_hosp <- filter(full_records, !is.na(reparto))
```


A record is considered completed when it has at least **anagrafica**,
**accettazione**, **pim**, **dimissione** filled.
